title: AWS SES S3 Email Processor
snippet:
Emails are being received by AWS SES and stored in an S3 bucket. I need a Lambda function to :
- activate when an object is put into the S3 bucket
- read the object and if it's an email with an attachment;
- - extract the attachment and save it to a second S3 bucket 
- - add metadata to the file as it is saved to the second bucket

The metadata being added to the object will come from the from:, to:, subject: vars of the original email object.
